Class WallBuilder

    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • frontWallHeight

        public static int frontWallHeight(Construction construction)
        Parameters:
        construction - : Construction object that it's attributes can not be null
        Returns:
        int height : calculated from dependencies between Tilt of Roof and Shed's depth - is a value of height of front Wall of shed. used in WallBuilder.addShedWalls method.

      • addShedWalls

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Wall> addShedWalls(Construction construction)
        Parameters:
        construction - Construction object that it's attributes can not be null
        Returns:
        ArrayList with four Wall objects that are being created from dependencies between Shed's lengths and width, constructions height and Roof's tilt. After being used changes wall list of Shed object of construcion from onewith 0 elements to one with 4 different elements Used in FunctionLayer.LogicFacade.setMaterialsForOrder, PresentationLayer.CarportBase.execute, PresentationLayer.EditOrderPrices.execute

      • createCarportWalls

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Wall> createCarportWalls(Construction construction,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> sides)
        Parameters:
        construction - : Construction object that it's attributes can not be null
        sides - : An ArrayLists with String as names of Walls to be created
        Returns:
        ArrayList with Wall object that are being created from dependencies After being used changes wall list of constuction object from one with 0 elements to one with from 0 to 4 elements depending on sides parameter and Shed's depth and width between Shed's lengths and width, constructions height, carportLength, carportWidth and Roof's tilt
